name: No Grave Too Shallow
description:
One man in aa endless loop of death. I mean debt. Play as a grave robber as he attempts to pay off his debts to the mafia by looting graves and tombs. Battle other famous grave robbers in the pits of the tomb - like Bindiana Bones and Jnora Soft. Prove your dominance, settle your debts (or don't), and show us That No Grave is Too Shallow.

WASD: Move

Left Mouse: Shoot

E: Interact
